snippet: In Chicago on Friday, President Obama will outline an initiative to select 20 communities as laboratories for better coordination of federal, local, nonprofit and private-sector investments.
abstract: Pres Obama visits his hometown of Chicago to promote new antipoverty policy initiatives; gives speech at Hyde Park Academy high school that turns personal as he pays tribute to Hadiya Pendleton, teenage girl gunned down in park, and touches on need for more gun control.
lead_paragraph: In Chicago on Friday, President Obama will outline an initiative to select 20 communities as laboratories for better coordination of federal, local, nonprofit and private-sector investments.

headline.seo: In Chicago, Policy Speech by Obama Turns Personal
headline.main: In His Hometown of Chicago, a Policy Speech by Obama Turns Personal
headline.print_headline: In His Hometown of Chicago, a Policy Speech by Obama Turns Personal
